What is the main focus of the article reporting the isolated compound?
data.answer: The isolation and structural characterization of the dimeric plumbaspherene [Cu4Pb22]4–

data.question: What is the significance of the isolated compound according to the article?
data.answer: It is considered a 'missing link' in the growth of lead-based Zintl clusters.

data.question: What method was used to collect crystallographic data for the isolated compound?
What is the role of the [Cu4Pb22]4– cluster according to the article?
data.answer: It acts as a nucleation site for additional zerovalent metal atoms, leading to the agglomeration of larger clusters.

data.question: What is the main difference between the chemistry of Cu, Ag, and Au in relation to the isolated compound?
data.answer: The chemistry of Ag stands out as distinct because the smallest nido-[MPb11]3– unit has been isolated only for Ag.
